source: If you’re low on soldiers to occupy new military sites, use the downward arrow button to decrease the capacity. You can also click on a soldier to send her away.
target: Mur urrainn dhut còmhnaidh a ghabhail ann an togalaichean an airm ùra on a tha na bana-ghaisgich air an ruith ort, cleachd putan na saighde sìos gus àitichean-fuirich a thoirt air falbh on togalach seo. Cuideachd, ’s urrainn dhut briogadh air bana-ghaisgich ach am falbh i.

source: But until that day, many years may pass! For now, we must concentrate on the present, and build a few lumberjack’s houses and a sawmill to produce some basic building materials.
target: Ach nach digeadh an latha ud a dh’aithghearr! Feumaidh sinn ar n-aire a thoirt air an latha an-diugh agus taighean do na coilltearan agus muileann sàbhaidh a thogail gus am faigh sinn stuthan togail bunasach.

source: The mines will still be able to produce then, but it will take about twenty times longer – ten times if it is a deep mine – to produce ores or coal. You probably want to prepare for the increasing demands of time and food.
target: ’S urrainn dha na mèinnean beagan cloich-mhèinnir no guail fhaighinn às an talamh fhathast ach bheir iad mu fhichead uiread nas fhaide – no deich uiread mas e mèinn dhomhainn a th’ ann.

source: To produce bricks, you need granite; to produce granite, you need a quarry or rock mine; to build those, you need bricks. Take care not to get deadlocked!
target: Feumaidh tu gaireal airson breigichean; cuaraidh no mèinn cloiche airson gaireal; feumaidh tu breigichean gus an togail. Thoir an aire nach ruith na breigichean ort!

source: Amazon woodcutters fell trees and jungle preservers will plant them. The resulting logs are used by the stone carver. The charcoal kiln also needs logs to produce charcoal.
target: Leagaidh buaineadairean-fiodha na h-Amasoin craobhan agus cuiridh na glèidheadair-coille craobhan ùra. Cleachdaidh na snaidheadairean am fiodh a gheibh thu às. Feumaidh an sloc guail-fhiodha fiodh cuideachd airson gual a sholar.

source: The weapon smithy and the shipyard also use planks to produce the different tridents and mighty ships.
target: Cleachdaidh a’ cheàrdach arm is an doca maidean cuideachd gus muirgheadhan is longan cumhachdach a thogail.

source: This is a hardened spear with a stone tip. It is produced in a stone workshop and used in a warriors’ gathering – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Seo sleagh chruaidh le spìc cloiche. Saothraichidh tu ann an ceàrdach cloiche i is thèid a cleachdadh ann an tionail nam bana-ghaisgeach – le biadh – gus ionnsaigh nan gaisgeach oideachadh o leibheil 1 gu leibheil 2.

source: The point is that the first island only provides rocks and trees, the second only meadows and resources. The economies you leave behind will continue to work for you, but you will only reap the benefits at the moment you reach a new island.
target: ’S e cnag na cùise nach doir a’ chiad eilean dhut ach carraigean is craobhan ’s nach fhaigh thu ach machair ’s clach-mèinneir is gual air an dàrna eilean. Obraichidh an t-eaconamaidh air na h-eileanan roimhe fhathast ach chan fhaigh thu buannachd às ach aig an àm a ruigeas tu eilean ùr.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: ’S urrainn do 12 shaighdear còmhnaidh ann an cathair is ’s ise togalach an airm as motha as urrainn dha na Tùsanaich a thogail. Tha i glè chosgail cuideachd is bheir e ùine mhòr gus tè a thogail. Tha i nas fheàrr gus ionadan cudromach a dhìon a leithid àiteachan caola no beanntan.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, they will stop fishing.
target: Cùm sùil air na h-iasgairean agad. Sguiridh iad dhen iasgach nuair nach eil iasg san raon-obrach aca tuilleadh.

source: The traitor left his armies dying where they lay when he saw that he would not keep my forces back. Kalitath disappeared in the confusion of the war, but I don’t care now. Shall he flee and be forgotten for all times as a tribal leader that would not bow before the wooden throne, that is mine to take now.
target: Dh’fhàg an cealgair na daoine aige gus am faigheadh iad bàs far an robh iad ’nan laighe nuair a mhothaich e nach b’ urrainn dha mo chumail air ais. Theich Kalitath ann an ùpraid a’ chogaidh ach tha mi coma a-nis. Gun teicheadh e ’s gun rachadh e a-mach à cuimhne gu bràth mar an ceannard nach gèilleadh fon chathair fhiodha a ghabhas mi fhìn a-nis.

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Co-dhiù no co-dheth, bhiodh an nàire orm gu bràth mura dèanainn sabaid an aghaidh nan Tùsanach. Air an adhbhar sin, dh’fhàg mi Fremil air long gus saoghal ’s beatha ùr a lorg dhomh àiteigin gu deas. Tha mi a’ seòladh Camas Pherl le mo theaghlach ’s mo cuideachd a-nis.

source: We landed on an unknown coast and found peaceful rest under the palm trees growing at the shore. But that is about as good as it gets. The truth is: when I woke up this morning, I saw nothing but sand around us.
target: Bhuail sinn tràigh nach aithne dhuinn agus fhuair sinn fois shìtheil fo na craobhan-pailm a tha a’ fàs air an oirthir. Ach ’s ann nach eil deagh naidheachd eile ann. A dh’innse na fìrinn, nuair a dhùisg mi an-diugh, chan fhaca mi ach gainneamh timcheall oirnn.

source: At first, I was naive and hoped that they were peaceful, but as soon as one of them saw me, they charged towards me and started attacking me with their throwing spears. Thanks be to the Gods that I was able to flee and hide myself, before retreating back to our colony under cover of darkness.
target: Nach mise a bha gorm aig an toiseach ’s làn dòchais gum biodh iad sìtheil ach cho luath ’s a mhothaich iad dhomh, ghabh iad orm leis na sleaghan tilgeil aca. Taing do na diathan gun deach leam teicheadh agus m’ fhalach mus do chùlaich mi don tuineachadh againn air an oidhche.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Tha treubh nan Tùsanach air an do bhruidhinn e ’na bhagairt dhuinn cuideachd. Chan eil mi airson an tìr seo a cho-roinneadh le sluagh eile idir o nach digeadh ach còmhstri is sabaid oirnn mar a thigeadh san t-seann-dhachaigh againn. Feumaidh sinn ruaig a chur air na Tùsanaich cuideachd.

source: Krumta, carpenter of Chat’Karuth
target: Krumta, saor Chat’Karuith

source: Lower the demand for marble columns in the economy settings to four. This will help to save some marble for buildings.
target: Ìslich an t-iarrtas air colbhan marmoir gu ceithir ann an roghainnean na h-eaconamaidh. Cuidichidh seo ach an caomhain sinn beagan marmoir airson togalaichean.

source: By changing the target quantity, you can therefore decide which wares/tools your resources (in this case: iron) should be turned into or whether you would like to save your iron and wait until you know what you will need it for.
target: Nuair a shuidhicheas tu an t-uiread-amais, cuiridh tu romhad dè am bathar/na h-acainnean a thèid a dhèanamh dhen stòras a th’ agad (iarainn sa bhall-eisimpleir seo) no am b’ fheàrr leat an t-iarann a ghlèidheadh gus am bi fios agad air dè nì thu leis.

source: This is an advanced spear with a steel tip. It is produced in a weapon smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Seo sleagh leasaichte le barr stàilinn. Saothraichidh tu ann an ceàrdach arm i is thèid a cleachdadh sa champa oideachaidh – le biadh – gus ionnsaigh nan saighdearan oideachadh o leibheil 1 gu leibheil 2.

source: ‘When we looked down to the valley from our newly established barrier, we felt that the spirit of our fathers was with us.’
target: “Nuair a choimhead sinn sìos dhan ghleann on taigh-fhaire ùr againn, dh’fhairich sinn gun robh anman ur sinnsearan còmhla rinn.”

source: Boldreth seems more and more torn as the days go by. The spirits of my fellows sink as the cold season approaches, and we are still living in no more than huts and barracks. I never intended to stay out here in the wilderness for so long – but I never thought my brothers would engage in this senseless battle for so long either.
target: Tha Boldrad fo bharrachd uallach gach latha. Tha an leann-dubh a’ tighinn air mo chuideachd on a tha an geamhradh gu bhith tighinn oirnn agus chan eil sinn a’ fuireach ach ann am bothanan. Cha robh mi an dùil fuireach san fhàsach seo cho fada sin – ach cha shaoilinn a-riamh gum maireadh an còmhstri gun chiall seo eadar mo dhà bhràthair cho fada sin.

source: Menu of the tavern ‘Ye Ol’ Bronze Axe’
target: Clàr-bìdh an taighe-tàirn “An tuagh umha”

source: Well done so far. We have produced enough wheat. Now dismantle the farm and build the next building in the production chain.
target: Rinn sinn gu math gu ruige seo. Tha sinn air cruitheachd gu leòr a shaothrachadh. Nise, thoir an tuathanas às a chèile agus tog an togalach a dh’fheumas sinn airson an ath-cheuma.

source: Brother, I’m really worried that I have to deliver bad news again. As you can see, our farms aren’t producing anything and we can’t dismantle them.
target: A bhràthair, tha an t-amharas orm gu bheil droch-naidheachd agam a-rithist. Mar a chì thu, chan eil na tuathanasan againn a’ saothrachadh dad sam bith agus chan urrainn dhuinn an toirt às an cèile.

source: This situation was caused by the sad fact that our people lost the instructions on how to construct and operate farms. Therefore they have zero productivity and the constructors don’t know how to dismantle them either.
target: ’S e an dorch-fhortan gun do chaill ar muinntir na planaichean-togail is obrachaidh nan tuathanasan. Chan fhaigh iad cinneasachadh sam bith air a shàilleibh agus chan eil fios aig an luchd-togail mar a bheireas iad às an cèile iad nas motha.

source: Your well established smuggling routes suddenly got busy: two other tribes have appeared and now a rivalry among smugglers has started. Which team will be the first to smuggle a certain number of wares?
target: Dh’fhàs na slighean cùiltearachd stèidhichte agad trang gu h-obann: nochd dà threubh eile ’s tha còmhstri am measg an luchd-cùiltearachd air a tòiseachadh. Cò an sgioba a mhalairteas uiread de bhathar ro chàch?

source: But all seemed well. Only the horses seemed to feel something was wrong. During the nights, they went crazy and were full of fear. It was not long before the horse breeder Xydra figured out what was wrong with them: the sea level in front of their stable was rising with ever increasing speed.
target: Co-dhiù, cha robh dragh air duine. Cha do dh’fhairich ach na h-eich gun robh càil ceàrr. Bhiodh iad gòrach leis an t-eagal rè na h-oidhche. Cha b’ fhada gus an do thuig an gille-each Xydra na bha ceàrr orra: bha àirde na mara air beulaibh an stàbaill ag èirigh na bu luaithe ’s na bu luaithe.

source: This is good news indeed, Opol. Our economy is developing very well. Go back to your work now, Opol, and may Satul warm you and all your guild members!
target: Seo deagh naidheachd dha-rìribh, Opol. Tha an eaconamaidh againn a’ fàs glè mhath. Till don obair agad a-nis, Opol agus gum blàthaicheadh Satul thu agus gach bhall de chomann nam breabadair!

source: Today I saw the first recruits gathering in front of the new barracks. If everything goes well, they should receive their training soon.
target: Chunnaic mi na ciad glas-laoich cruinn còmhla air beulaibh an taighe-fheachd ùir an-diugh. Chan fhada gus am faigh iad oideachadh ma thèid leinn mar bu chòir.

source: So you want to prepare us for a longer stay in these forests, Thron? Well, I see the wisdom in doing so, yet my heart is yearning for a glorious return to Al’thunran. Too long have we waited while our brethren have fought on the battlefield, and our axes and swords have turned rusty over time.
target: An ann gu bheil thu airson ar n-ullachadh ach am fuirich sinn sna coilltean seo nas fhaide, a Throin? Uill, tuigidh mi an gliocas a th’ ann, ach tha fadachd ’nam chridhe gus an till sinn gu Al’tùnran gu soirbheachail. Tha sinn air fuireach ro fhada ann a sheo mar-thà fad ’s a tha ar cuideachd a’ sabaid an aghaidh càch a chèile air a’ bhlàr agus tha na tuaghan is claidheamhan againn air am fàs meirgeach.

source: Wonderful! Our roofs are not dripping anymore, and we have all the material we need for, well, whichever monumental building we see fit!
target: Sgoinneil! Chan dig an t-uisge tro ar mullaichean tuilleadh agus tha stuth-togail againn airson… tha… canamaid togalach spaideil mòr sam bith a thogras sinn!

source: He told me about the blockhouse. Well, I don’t think we need more blockhouses – instead, we might concentrate on other things now.
target: Dh’innis e dhomh mun taigh-bhloca. Uill, ar leam chan eil sinn feumach air barrachd taighean-bloca a-nis – bu chòir dhuinn ar n-aire a thoirt air cùisean eile.

source: I think I have heard the wind carrying some weird but well known sounds from the north. If I’m not totally wrong, I have heard some Barbarian war drums. So, we should better go and have a look at what is going on up there.
target: Cha chreid mi nach cuala mi fuaim a’ tighinn a-steach leis a’ ghaoth, neònach ach cho aithnichte dhuinn. Mur eil mi ceàrr, ’s e drumaichean-cogaidh nan Tùsanach a chuala mi. Mar sin, b’ fheàirrde sinn dol a-null thall feuch am faigh sinn a-mach dè tha a’ tachairt ann.

source: Unfortunately, we lost our holy shrine of Neptune in the great storm, so we can’t worship him well. I think we should search the whole region to see if we can recover all six pieces of the shrine.
target: Gu mì-fhortanach, chaill sinn ar n-altair naomh Neaptuin sa ghailleann agus chan urrainn dhuinn ùrnaigh cheart a dhèanamh dha. Saoilidh mi gum bu chòir dhuinn an sgìre shlàn a rùrachadh feuch an gabhamaid na sia leacan aice uile air ais.

source: Sire, we need to train some of our people to serve in your great army. It is important to increase the number of our soldiers as fast as we can. And we should train them well to improve their fighting abilities.
target: A thighearna, feumaidh sinn barrachd dhaoine a thogail dhan arm mhòr againn. Tha e cudromach gun cuir sinn ris na saighdearan againn cho luath ’s a ghabhas. Agus bu chòir dhuinn an oideachadh ach am bi iad nas comasaiche air a’ bhlàr.

source: Well done, well done. Our road network looks a lot more structured than before.
target: Glè mhath. Tha coltas mòran nas rianaile air na rathaidean againn a-nis.

source: If you did not prepare well enough to master this challenge in time, you can reload the scenario from the backup savegame automatically created for you shortly before you reached the enemy’s headquarters.
target: Mura deach leat ullachadh airson seasamh an aghaidh an dùbhlain seo ri àm, ’s urrainn dhut an cnàmh-sgeul ath-luchdadh on lethbhreac-ghlèidhidh a chaidh a chruthachadh dhut gu fèin-obrachail nuair a ràinig thu phrìomh-àras an nàmhad.

source: We should start by taking care of our wood production. Trees don’t seem to grow well on this island; better build at least two houses for foresters and one for a woodcutter.
target: Bu chòir dhuinn tòiseachadh le saothrachadh fiodha. Tha coltas nach fhàs craobhan glè mhath san eilean seo; b’ fheàirrde sinn co-dhiù dà thaigh a thogail dha na planntairean-coille agus fear dhan bhuaineadair-fhiodha.

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Misnichibh on a mhothaich mi gu bheil dòchas againn fhathast! Tha coltas gu bheil ceann an ear an eilein iomchaidh airson port a thogail ann mar bhiodh an àite far an robh prìomh-àras an deamhain. Ma thèid leinn long a thogail ’s ma chuireas sinn innte na dh’fheumas sinn airson tuineachadh ùr a thogail, dh’fhaoidte gun dèid leinn teicheadh.

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Bha mi airson ionnsachadh dhut mar a thogas tu bratach ùr, ach tha e agad mar-thà a-rèir coltais. Sin thu fhèin!

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Aig a’ cheann a tuath an-seo, chan eil ach mèinn òir agus taigh-stòrais agad. Fad ’s a tha biadh a dh’fhòghnas aig na mèinnearan, chan eil dòigh ann gus a’ chlach-òir a chur dhan cheàrdach leaghadair ceann a deas.

source: The random map generator is still in beta stage. The maps it generates are usually – but not always – well playable. Seafaring and artifacts are not supported. Add-ons of the World, Tribes, and Script categories are disabled in random matches.
target: Chan eil gineadair nam mapaichean foirfe fhathast. Gabhaidh na mapaichean a ghineas e a chluich mar as trice ach gha ghabh an-còmhnaidh. Chan eil taic ri seòladaireachd no buill-ealain. Thèid tuilleadain saoghail, treubha is sgriobta a chur à comas ann an geamannan air mapaichean tuaireamach.

source:
‘He loves the animals and to breed them
as we love to cook and eat them.’
target:
“Is esan a bhrideas
is sinne a dh’itheas.”

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Tha mi ’n dòchas nach do mhothaich Lanasa – an tighearna-cogaidh a chumas smachd air a’ chaisteal ud – air ar gluasadan fhathast. Dh’fhaodte gun dèid leinn an togalach mòr ud a bhuinnigeadh gun strì ro mhòr! Co-dhiù no co-dheth, tha e riatanach gun gabh sinn e. Seo na bheir smachd air an eilean dhuinn!

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Tha biadh glè chudromach do mhèinnean ’s ionadan-oideachaidh an airm. Stèidhich àrainneachd a nì biadh gu dòigheil le co-dhiù aon tuathanas, tuathanas fhreumhagan ’s muileann. Nì taigh-fuine dà sheòrsa arain às an dà sheòrsa min-fhlùir ’s uisge on tobar, mar sin tog taigh-fuine ’s tobar cuideachd.

source: Build a shipyard close to the lake to start building ships
target: Tog doca faisg air an loch gus longan a thogail

source: Oooh and even more important: the smoking of fish and meat to cleanse them and improve their taste is terrible. My house is full of smoke and stinks for weeks afterwards. Don’t you think that this could be done in a special building where the side effects do not matter? I think those two things would be accepted by the people and would reduce the cooking time without taking away the ritual.
target: Ò agus nas cudromaiche buileach: tha e dòrainneach an t-iasg is feòil a thoiteadh gus an glanadh ’s piseach a thoirt air a’ bhlas a th’ orra. Tha an taigh agam loma-làn smùide agus bidh droch-fhàileadh ann fad seachdainean. Saoilibh am b’ urrainn dhuinn seo a dhèanamh ann an togalach sònraichte far nach biodh an droch-bhuil gu diofar? Saoilidh mi gun gabhadh an sluagh ris an dà chùis seo agus cha bhiodh againn ri ùine mhòr a thoirt seachad air a’ chòcaireachd is sinn a’ cumail ris a’ gnàths fhathast.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. My name is Opol, and I am the highest weaver of the guild abandoning Atlantis and Lutas with you. I come with sad news indeed: we have no more spidercloth. Not a single piece is to be found in our warehouses. Could you not help the weavers’ guild by arranging the building of a weaving mill and a spider farm? The spiders deliver the finest silk and we will produce the finest spidercloth from it.
target: Gum blàthaicheadh Satul sibh, a Jundlina. Is mise Opol agus tha mi ’nam àrd-bhreabadair aig a’ chomann-cheàrd a dh’fhàg Atlantas agus Lutas còmhla ribh. Thàinig mi le droch-naidheachd dha-rìribh: dh’fhalbh an sìoda oirnn. Chan eil gin dheth air fhàgail sna taighean-stòrais againn. Nach cuidich sibh comann nam breabadair ach an dèid taigh nam beart is rainse dhamhan a thogail? Bheir na damhain deagh shnàth-sìoda mìn dhuinn agus nì sinn an sìoda as snasaile às.

source: The implications frighten me. Are there others on this island? Where are they then? They work with fire, are they praying to Satul too? Are they friends or foe? And why is the building burned down? Has this island seen war? Is a war being waged on it right now?
target: Cuiridh nas ciall dha eagal orm. A bheil daoine eile a’ fuireach san eilean seo? Càite a bheil iad mar-thà? Tha iad ag obair le teine, a bheil iad a’ leantainn Satuil cuideachd? A bheil iad càirdeil no nàimhdeil? Agus carson a chaidh an togalach a chur ’na theine? An dàinig an cogadh air an eilean seo a-riamh? A bheil cogadh ann an-dràsta fhèin?

source: We found one more building of this strange making. We have yet to see any of its builders. But obviously there has been a community on this island before and obviously it was militarized. I have to check on our military status with my generals. I will not allow that a potential enemy will find us unprepared.
target: Lorg sinn fear eile de na togalaichean neònach ud. Chan eil sgeul air na daoine a thog iad fhathast. Ach bha coimhearsnachd san eilean seo roimhe gun teagamh agus tha e follaiseach gun robh feachd aca. Feumaidh mi bruidhinn ris na cinn-armailt agam a thaobh cor an fheachd againn. Cha cheadaich mi gun dig nàmhaid oirnn ma dh’fhaoidte is sinn gun uallachadh.

source: We lost a building to the ocean!
target: Chaill sinn togalach sa chuan!

source: Start building mines on the mountain
target: Tòisich air mèinnean a thogail air a’ bheinn

source: This is only the first example of a ware which has to be refined before being used in a secondary building – others will follow.
target: Chan e seo ach a’ chiad ball-eisimpleir de bhathar a bhios feumach air giullachd mur cleachd togalach dàrnach e – chì thu feadhainn eile ann an uairsin.

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well. For the best productivity, build it on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: ’S e na h-iasgairean agus na tuathanasan a th’ anns na dòighean eile gus biadh a dhèanamh – seòrsaichean bìdh eadar-dhealaichte. Feumaidh tu a’ chruithneachd aig na tuathanasan a ghiullachd le uisge ann an taigh-fuine mus gabh i ithe. Gheibh thu uisge o thobar. Airson cinneasachadh as fheàrr, tog e air àite far an do lorg clach-eòlaiche uisge.

source: A normal mine can only dig up about one third of all the resources that lie beneath it; then it must be enhanced to a deep mine in order to keep it working properly. To enhance a building, choose it and then click the appropriate button in the appearing window.
target: Chan urrainn do mhèinn àbhaisteach ach an treas pàirt dhen stòras a tha foidhpe a ghearradh às an talamh; feumaidh tu a leasachadh an uairsin gu mèinn dhomhainn ach an obraich i mar bu chòir fhathast. Gus togalach a leasachadh, tagh e agus briog air a’ phutan iomchaidh san uinneag a nochdas.

source: Workers gain experience by successful work. With enough experience, they become more advanced workers, who are necessary to operate the enhanced buildings. Do not enhance a building before you have enough advanced workers to operate the advanced building!
target: Gheibh luchd-obrach eòlas le obair shoirbheachail. Thèid iad ’nan neach-obrach as àrda nuair a bhios eòlas gu leòr aca agus bidh feum agad air an t-seòrsa seo de neach-obrach gus togalach leasaichte a ruith. Na leasaich togalach mus eil luchd-obrach àrda gu leòr agad gus an togalach leasaichte a ruith!

source: Such buildings usually have greater demands than the basic kind of that building – for instance, deep mines need snacks instead of rations. You will have to enhance your tavern to an inn in order to produce snacks out of pitta bread AND a second kind of food (meat or fish) AND beer.
target: Tha barrachd feumalachdan air togalaichean mar sin na tha aig an togalach bhunasach mar as àbhaist – mar eisimpleir, iarraidh mèinnean domhain lòin seach greimeagan. Feumaidh tu an taigh-tàirn agad a leasachadh gu taigh-òil ach an urrainn dhut lòin a dhèanamh is ’s ann gun dèan thu seo dhe dh’aran tur agus seòrsa eile de bhiadh (feòil no iasg) agus leann.

source: You can obtain water by building a well upon a water source, which your geologists can discover when you send them to any flag that is not on a mountain.
target: Tog tobar air àite far a bheil uisge san talamh. Lorgaidh clach-eòlaiche uisge dhut nuair a chuireas tu gu bratach nach eil air beinn e.

source: Coal can be obtained by building a charcoal kiln or a coal mine. Burning charcoal out of logs is slow. You should only build a charcoal kiln when no coal is available.
target: ’S urrainn dhut taghadh an tog thu sloc guail-fhiodha no mèinn guail ach am faigh thu gual. Co-dhiù, ’s e obair slaodach a th’ ann gual a losgadh à fiodh. Cha bu chòir dhut sloc guail-fhiodha a thogail ach mur eil gual ri làimh.

source: To attack an enemy, you must click on the door of an adversary’s military building. A menu will pop up allowing you to select the number of soldiers that should attack. When you are ready with setting the number, click on the cross (‘Start Attack’).
target: Feumaidh tu briogadh air doras togalach an airm gus ionnsaigh a thoirt air an nàmhaid. Nochdaidh clàr-taice a leigeas leat an àireamh dhe shaighdearan a thaghadh a nì ionnsaigh. Nuair a bhios tu ullamh le suidheachadh na h-àireimh, briog air a’ chrois (“Thoir ionnsaigh”).

source: Boldreth is right! We don’t have enough food to survive a long, cold winter. We should start building a well, a fisher’s and a hunter’s hut. And if we find enough space, we should as well build up a farm and a bakery! One of our farmers seems to be very clever – he already got some crops to grow in this cold soil.
target: Tha Boldrad ceart! Chan eil biadh gu leòr ann airson geamhraidh fhada fhuair. Bu chòir dhuinn tòiseachadh air tobar, bothan-iasgair is bothan-sealgair a thogail. Agus ma tha rùm gu leòr againn, bu chòir dhuinn tuathanas is taigh-fuine a thogail cuideachd! Tha coltas gu bheil aon dhe na tuathanaich againn glè sheòlta – chaidh leis bàrr a thogail san talamh fhuar seo mar-thà.

source: But unfortunately the logs are useless for repairing our ship – we need to turn them into planks, which are needed by every ship and every bigger building too. So we should build a sawmill – as soon as we have enough space for this.
target: Ach gu mì-fhortanach, chan eil am fiodh mar a tha e gu feum gus an long a chàradh – feumaidh sinn na maidean a dhèanamh dheth a dh’fheumas gach long is togalach mòr. Mar sin, bu chòir dhuinn muileann sàbhaidh a thogail – cho luath ’s a bhios àite ann dha.

source: Good news! Today our wood economy was completed. Now we can be sure that we will have enough wood for our future building projects.
target: Deagh naidheachd! Chaidh an eaconamaidh fiodha againn a choileanadh an-diugh. Bidh sinn cinnteach a-nis gum faigh sinn fiodh gu leòr airson nan togalaichean ùra againn san àm ri teachd.

source: That’s good. The first big military building is complete and the mining infrastructure is getting better and better. Now we should think about preparing ourselves for battle.
target: ’S math sin. Tha a’ chiad togalach mòr an airm deiseil agus tha bun-structar na mèinnearachd air a dhol am feabhas. Bu chòir dhuinn beachdachadh air ar n-ullachadh airson a’ chogaidh a-nis.

source: Produce cloth for building our first ship
target: Dèan clò gus a’ chiad long againn a thogail

source: Now we truly can look forward to building some ships. So, we should build a shipyard as well.
target: Tha sinn an dùil gum bi longan gu feum duinn a-nis. Nach tog sinn doca cuideachd?

source: So, we need more cloth to finally be able to build ships. But there is no space on the island for building a whole economy to produce cloth. Therefore, we need to build the necessary wares step by step.
target: Air an adhbhar sin, feumaidh sinn barrachd clòtha mus urrainn dhuinn longan a thogail. Gidheadh, chan eil rùm san eilean airson eaconamaidh slàn a thogail a shaothraicheas clò dhuinn. Leis a sin, feumaidh sinn na batharan a dh’fheumas sinn a chruthachadh ceum air cheum.

source: After the production of enough wheat, we can dismantle the farm and build a sheep farm to produce wool. When the sheep farm starts working, we could find or free up space for a medium building to build a weaving mill to use our wool for weaving cloth. But for the moment being, let’s start by producing a reasonable amount of wheat.
target: Nuair a bhios sinn air cruithneachd gu leòr a bhuain, ’s urrainn dhuinn an tuathanas a thoirt às a chèile agus faing a thogail a dhèanamh clòimhe. Nuair a bhios an fhaing ag obair, b’ urrainn dhuinn àite a shaoradh airson tobalach meadhanach ach an tog sinn taigh nam beart air airson clò fhighe às a’ chlòimh. Co-dhiù no co-dheth, tòisicheamaid le cuid reusanta a chruithneachd.

source: Well done so far. We have produced enough wheat. Now dismantle the farm and build the next building in the production chain.
target: Rinn sinn gu math gu ruige seo. Tha sinn air cruitheachd gu leòr a shaothrachadh. Nise, thoir an tuathanas às a chèile agus tog an togalach a dh’fheumas sinn airson an ath-cheuma.

source: Now that we have all resources ready for building a ship, we should explore the surrounding islands.
target: Nise on a tha na stòrasan deis againn airson long a thogail, bu chòir dhuinn na h-eileanan timcheall oirnn a rùrachadh.

source: I strongly recommend building a production chain for mining and melting some gold. I think we need a vineyard, a winery, a tavern, a fisher’s house or a hunter’s house and a smelting works. And the mines themselves of course.
target: Mholainn-sa gun tog sinn gnìomhachasan airson òr a thochladh ’s a leaghadh. Saoilidh mi gum bi sinn feumach air fìon-lios, fìon-lann, taigh-tàirn, taigh-iasgair no taigh-sealgair agus ceàrdach leaghadair. Agus na mèinnean fhèin, gu nàdarra.

source: I’m just kidding. Of course we should spare as much gold as we can for building an arena and other buildings to train our soldiers.
target: ’S ann gu bheil mi a’ tarraing asad. ’S cinnteach gum bu chòir dhuinn na ghabhas a dh’òr a chaomhnadh ach an tog sinn raon spòrs agus togalaichean eile airson na saighdearan againn oideachadh.

source: For example, it might be a good idea to produce a reasonable amount of a ware and afterwards dismantle the building to gain space for another building.
target: Mar eisimpleir, ’s dòcha gum biodh e glic uiread reusanta a bhathar a shaothrachadh ’s an togalach a thoirt às a chèile an uairsin ach am faigh sinn barrachd rùm airson togalach eile.

source: Open the Building Window of a Farm
target: Fosgail uinneag tuathanais

source: Click on a farm building to open its building window. This will let you analyze the building.
target: Briog air tuathanas a dh’fhosgladh an uinneag-togalaich aige. Leigidh seo leat an togalach a sgrùdadh.

source: Now we can start building farms to produce the beer which our miners need so desperately. Furthermore, the plans have enabled us to upgrade our old farms to get to work again.
target: ’S urrainn dhuinn tòiseachadh air tuathanasan a thogail a-nis ach an dèan sinn leann agus cruaidh-fheum aig na mèinnearan againn air. A bharrachd air sin, thug na planaichean comas dhuinn na seann-thuathanasan againn a leasachadh ach an obraich iad a-rithist.

source: But this will be some hard work still. For now, we should start by building some houses for our fishermen. As all the fish has been caught at our coast, we should try our luck in the eastern part of our territory.
target: Gidheadh, tha obair chruaidh romhainn fhathast. Bu chòir dhuinn taighean a thogail dha na h-iasgairean againn a-nis. Chaidh an t-iasg uile a ghlacadh aig an oirthir, mar sin bu chòir dhuinn taobh ear an ranntair againn fheuchainn.

source: Amalea restricts the building possibilities…
target: Tha Amalea a’ cuingeachadh dè thèid a thogail…

source: The scouts informed me that the enemy can’t build towers. We could build a fortress, which is the building that will push the border as far east as possible in one go. The enemy will only be able to see it if they build a fortress right at the border.
target: Dh’innis na rabhadairean dhomh nach eil an nàmhaid comasach air tùir a thogail. B’ urrainn dhuinn dùn a thogail agus ’s e seo an togalach a chuireas a’ chrìoch as fhaide ear sa bhad. Chan fhaic an nàmhaid e ach ma thogas iad dùn aca fhèin aig a’ chrìoch fhèin.

source: My scouts no longer report any signs of living creatures nearby. We will start building our new home here.
target: Cha do lorg na rabhadairean againn sgeul air creutair beò am fagas. Togaidh sinn ar dachaigh ùr ann a sheo.

source: We must start by building all the basic buildings. I see no mountains nearby where we might mine coal. We’d better build a charcoal kiln to burn logs into charcoal. We improve the kilns with clay so they don’t consume so much wood. Our neighbors used to envy us for this clever technique, which they couldn’t copy.
target: Feumaidh sinn tòiseachadh leis na togalaichean bunasach. Chan fhaic mi beann far an lorgamaid gual. B’ fheàirrde sinn sloc guail-fhiodha a thogail ach an loisg sinn gual de dh’fhiodh. Cuiridh sinn piseach air na slocan le criadh ach nach fheum iad cus a dh’fhiodh. Chuireadh an dòigh seo am farmad air ar nàbaidhean o nach deach leothasan a cur an cèill.

source: However, we can already start focusing on recruiting and training soldiers. We can now afford to use metal for weapons, helmets and garments. I propose building armor smithies, a barracks, a training arena and a tailor’s shop now.
target: Co-dhiù no co-dheth, ’s urrainn dhuinn ar n-aire a thoirt air trusadh ’s oideachadh nan saighdearan mu thràth. ’S urrainn dhuinn ruigsinn air meatailt airson airm, clogaidean is còtaichean-bèin. Mholainn-sa gun tog sinn ceàrdaichean armachd, taigh-feachd, raon oideachaidh ’s taigh tàillearachd a-nis.

source: Barbarians! You have refused my offer of friendship most ungraciously by destroying the beautiful building we presented you with!
target: A bhorbairibh! Dhiùlt sibh mo thairgse air càirdeas gu neo-ghràsmhor nuair a mhill sibh an togalach drùidhteach a thug sinn dhuibh!

source: The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will then go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: ’S e togalach beag a th’ anns a’ bhothan choillteir is mar sin taghaidh mi taba nan togalaichean beaga. Taghaidh mi am bothan coillteir an uairsin.

source: This button toggles showing the building’s work area. When the lumberjack leaves the building to look for trees to fell, he will only look for them within this area. Let me show you how perfect this spot is.
target: Seallaidh is falaichidh am putan seo raon obrach an togalaich. Nuair a dh’fhàgas an coilltear am bothan an toir air craobh a leaghadh e, cha lorg e gin ach am broinn an raoin seo. Seallaidh mi dhut dè cho foirfe ’s a tha am bad seo.

source: Red building symbols can only hold small buildings and flags.
target: Chan urrainn dhut ach togalach beag no bratach a thogail air samhla taighe dearg.

source: If you decide you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting the abort symbol.
target: Ma chuireas tu romhad nach tog thu rathad an-dràsta, ’s urrainn dhut sgur de thogail an rathaid ’s tu a’ briogadh air bratach tòiseachaidh an rathaid ’s a’ taghadh an samhla sguir dheth.

source: When there are many rocks, you can consider building another quarry. This will make the granite production faster.
target: Nuair a bhios tòrr charraigean ann, saoil an tog thu cuaraidh eile? Gheibh thu gaireal nas luaithe mar sin.

source: In order to show or hide the building census labels, you can select the ‘Show Census’ / ‘Hide Census’ entry from the ‘Show / Hide’ menu on the bottom, or press the ‘%s’ key on the keyboard.
target: Airson leubailean cunntas-sluaigh nan togalaichean a nochdadh no fhalach, tagh “Seall an cunntas-sluaigh”/“Falaich an cunntas-sluaigh” sa chlàr-taice “Seall / Falaich” aig a’ bhonn no brùth air an iuchair “%s” air a’ mheur-chlàr.

source: Burning down the quarry: This is the fastest way of clearing the space. While the worker abandons the building, the wares are lost.
target: Milleadh a’ chuaraidh: seo an dòigh as luaithe gus an rùm fhaighinn air ais. Fad ’s a dh’fhalbhas an neach-obrach thèid gach bathair san togalach air chall.

source: Build a military building on your border. Choose the one you like most.
target: Tog togalach an airm aig a’ chrìoch. Tagh fear sam bith a thogras tu.

source: As soon as a military building is manned, it will extend your land. I will tell you more about military buildings in another tutorial.
target: Cho luath ’s a bhios saighdear air còmhnaidh a ghabhail ann an togalach an airm agad, leudaichidh an ranntair agad. Innsidh mi barrachd dhut mu thogalaichean an airm ann an oideachadh eile.

source: One of these training sites is the battle arena. It is a big and expensive building, and it trains soldiers in evade. Since soldiers get very hungry during their workout, this building needs a lot of food and strong beer. In a real game, you should have a good infrastructure before you build it.
target: Is an raon catha aon dhe na h-ionadan-oideachaidh ud. ’S e togalach daor mòr a th’ ann agus oidichidh e teàrnadh nan saighdearan. Air sgàth ’s gun dig an t-acras air na saighdearan leis an obair chruaidh a nì iad ann, bidh an togalach seo feumach air mòran bìdh agus leanna làidir. Ann an geama dearbh, bu chòir do bhun-structar math a bhith agad mus tog thu fear.

source: There is a second training site: the training camp. It is a big building too, and to complement the battle arena, it trains attack and health (remember, the Barbarian soldiers cannot be trained in defense).
target: Tha ionad-oideachaidh eile ann agus seo an campa oideachaidh. ’S e togalach mòr a th’ ann cuideachd agus a chùm nach dèan an raon catha a choileanadh, nì e oideachadh ionnsaighe agus slàinte (cuimhnich nach urrainn dha na saighdearan Tùsanach oideachadh dìona fhaighinn).

source: In every military building, you can set the preference for heroes (trained soldiers) or rookies. From time to time, a soldier will walk out of the building and be replaced by a stronger/weaker one automatically – this is what you saw earlier.
target: Anns gach togalach an airm, ’s urrainn dhut suidheachadh am b’ fheàrr leis seann-ghaisgich (saighdearan air an oideachadh) no saighdearan ùra. Fàgaidh saighdear an togalach o àm gu àm agus thig fear nas treasa/nas laige a-steach ’na àite gu fèin-obrachail – seo na chunnaic thu roimhe.

source: The initial setting depends on the type of the building. For the Barbarians, the sentry is the only building that prefers rookies by default. You should change this setting to fit your current needs.
target: Tha an roghainn bhunaiteach a-rèir seòrsa gach togalaich. Airson nan Tùsanach, ’s e am freiceadan a tha san aon togalach as fheàrr leis saighdearan ùra a ghnàth. Bu chòir dhut an roghainn seo atharrachadh a-rèir an t-suidheachaidh sa bheil thu.

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Tha dòigh eile san urrainn dhut an neart aig togalach an airm a stiùireadh agus ’s e seo an uiread de shaighdearan a dh’fhaodas còmhnaidh a ghabhail ann. Cha leig thu leas ach briogadh air na putanan saighde gus an uiread de shaighdearan a tha thu ag iarraidh ann a mheudachadh no a lùghdachadh. Tha uiread as motha de shaighdearan fa leth aig gach seòrsa de thogalach. ’S e còig a th’ ann airson an taighe-fhaire, mar eisimpleir.

source: The first number describes how many soldiers are currently in this building. In this example, only one soldier is left inside (each military building is always guarded by at least one soldier).
target: Seallaidh a’ chiad àireamh dhut co mheud saighdear a tha san togalach an-dràsta. Sa bhall-eisimpleir seo, chan eil ach aonar air fhàgail ann (thèid gach togalach an airm a dhìon le aonar shaighdearan air a char as lugha).

source: The second number tells you how many additional soldiers reside in this building, but are currently outside. The five soldiers may be attacking an enemy. They will return when they have been successful.
target: Innsidh an dàrna àireamh dhut co mheud saighdear a ghabh còmhnaidh san togalach ach a tha taobh a-muigh an-dràsta. ’S dòcha gu bheil an còignear shaighdearan a’ toirt ionnsaigh dhan nàmhaid. Tillidh iad nuair a bhios air soirbheachadh leotha.

source: You can only reduce the number of soldiers to one. The last soldier of a building will never come out (unless this building is attacked). If you want to have your soldier elsewhere, you will have to dismantle or burn down the building.
target: Nuair a dh’ìslicheas tu uiread nan saighdearan, bidh aonan air fhàgail ann an-còmhnaidh. Cha dig an saighdear mu dheireadh a-mach às an togalach gu bràth (ach ma thèid ionnsaigh a thoirt air). Ma tha thu ag iarraidh an saighdear agad àiteigin eile, feumaidh tu an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh.

source: However, destroying a military building is always linked with a risk: the land is still yours, but it is no longer protected. Any enemy that builds his own military sites can take over that land without a fight, causing your buildings to burst into flames. Furthermore, some parts of the land can now be hidden under the fog of war. You should therefore only dismantle military buildings deep inside your territory where you are safe from enemies.
target: Co-dhiù, tha cunnart an lùib milleadh togalach an airm an-còmhnaidh: ’s ann agadsa a bhios an tìr fhathast ach cha bhi i fo dhìon tuilleadh. ’S urrainn do nàmhaid sam bith a thogas togalaichean an airm aige fhèin an tìr agad a ghabhail os làimh gun strì agus thèid na togalaichean agad ’nan teine an uairsin. A bharrachd air sin, dh’fhaoidte gun dèid cuid dhen tìr agad am falach fo cheò a’ chogaidh. Air adhbhar air sin, cha bu chòir dhut togalach an airm a thoirt às a chèile ach ma tha e domhain san ranntair agad far a bheil e sàbhailte o na nàimhdean.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: ’S urrainn do 12 shaighdear còmhnaidh ann an cathair is ’s ise togalach an airm as motha as urrainn dha na Tùsanaich a thogail. Tha i glè chosgail cuideachd is bheir e ùine mhòr gus tè a thogail. Tha i nas fheàrr gus ionadan cudromach a dhìon a leithid àiteachan caola no beanntan.

source: To attack a building, click on its doors, choose the number of soldiers that you wish to send and click on the ‘Attack’ button.
target: Gus ionnsaigh a thoirt air togalach, briog air an doras aige, tagh an àireamh de shaighdearan a bu toigh leat cur a-null agus briog air a’ phutan “Thoir ionnsaigh”.

source: The shipyard is a medium building. Although it can be built everywhere on the map, the shipwright only works when he is close to the water and there are no trees or roads at the shoreline.
target: ’S e togalach meadhanach a th’ anns an doca. Ged as urrainn dhut a thogail àite sam bith air a’ mhapa, cha dèan an saor-luinge obair ach ma bhios a’ mhuir faisg air agus mura bi craobhan no rathaidean ri taobh a’ chladaich.

source: This is the icon for stopping production. You will find it in the building window.
target: Seo an ìomhaigheag gus an saothrachadh a chur ’na stad. Chì thu ann an uinneag an togalaich i.

source: On this map, there is no enemy to fear. In other games, you should make building one or two military fortifications around your new colonies a priority.
target: Chan eil nàmhaid a’ toirt dùbhlan ort air a’ mhapa seo. Ann an geama àbhaisteach, mholainn-sa gun tog thu daingneachadh no dhà an airm mu na tuineachaidhean ùra agad gun dàil.

source: Now it’s your turn: Build a gold mine on the mountain in the south and connect it to the main land by building waterways over the streams.
target: Siuthad is feuch e a-nis: Tog mèinn òir sa bheinn ceann a deas agus ceangail i ris an tìr-mhòr le slighe aiseig thar nan sruthan.

source: Open the building statistics window for an overview over the buildings you have.
target: Fosgail uinneag stadastaireachd nan togalach airson foir-shealladh air na togalaichean a th’ agad.

source: This is the building statistics window. It shows you all buildings you can own, sorted by their size.
target: Seo uinneag stadastaireachd nan togalach. Seallaidh i dhut a h-uile togalach a b’ urrainn a bhith agad, air an seòrsachadh a-rèir am meud.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: “2/4” fon fhreiceadan agad: Airson togalaichean an airm, thèid na saighdearan a tha ann a shealltainn dhut seach cinneasachadh. Tha thu ag iarraidh ceithir saighdearan sna freiceadain agad ach chan eil ach dà shaighdear ’nan gearastan ann an togalaichean dhen t-seòrsa ud. Mar sin, tha dà dhreuchd fhalamh agad – tha sinn fìor-fheumach air saighdearan ùra.

source: If you click on a building, you can scroll through the buildings of the selected type.
target: Às dèidh briogadh air togalach, ’s urrainn dhut sgroladh tro na togalaichean dhen t-seòrsa a thagh thu.

source: If you don’t have any building of a particular building type, it will be shown greyed out.
target: Mur eil togalach sam bith dhe sheòrsa sònraichte agad, thèid a liathachadh a-mach.

source: When you move the slider to the blue area on the left side (low priority), the corresponding ware gets delivered less frequently. Red (right side) means that as many wares as possible should be delivered to this building, maybe because it produces something important.
target: Ma ghluaiseas tu an sleamhnachan dhan raon ghorm taobh clì (prìomhachas ìseal) thèid am bathar co-cheangailte rithe a lìbhrigeadh as ainneimhe. Is ciall dha dhearg (air an taobh deas) gun dèid na ghabhas dhen bhathar a lìbhrigeadh dhan togalach ud, ’s dòcha air sgàth ’s gun dèan e rudeigin cudromach.

source: Wares stored in the building are shown in full color.
target: Chì thu batharan a tha ’gan stòradh san togalach ann an dath slàn.

source: Wares not present in the building yet but already being transported there are shown in a darker grey.
target: Tha dath dorch-liath air na batharan nach eil san togalach fhathast ach a tha a’ tighinn thuige.

source: Most enhanced buildings need experienced workers. Do not enhance a building unless you have the necessary workers available.
target: Tha a’ mhòrchuid a thogalaichean leasaichte feumach air luchd-obrach eòlach. Na leasaich togalach mur eil an luchd-obrach a dh’fheumas iad ri fhaighinn.

source: You can place a medium building on any node where there is a slope no greater than 1 in the south-east direction and its height difference to all nodes in a radius of 2 is no greater than 2.
target: ’S urrainn dhut togalach meadhanach a chur air nòd mur eil an sliabh gu ear-dheas air nas motha na 1 agus mur eil diofar na h-àirde an coimeas gach nòid am broinn rèideis de 2 nas motha na 2.

source: You can place a big building on any node where you could place a medium building if there is no obstacle or non-arable terrain towards the west, northwest and northeast.
target: ’S urrainn ghut togalach mòr a chur air nòd sam bith far am b’ urrainn dhut togalach meadhanach a chur ann agus mur eil cnap-starra no tìr nach eil ’na thalamh-àitich gu iar, iar-thuath no ear-thuath air.

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Dèan cinnteach gun cuir thu clach-eòlaiche airson làraichean a rùrachadh mus tog thu tobar no mèinn.

source: Your territory can be expanded by building various military buildings – Sentry, Fortress, Blockhouse, etc.
target: ’S urrainn dhut barrachd ranntair a ghabhail ma thogas tu togalaichean an airm a leithid freiceadanan, dùin, taighean-bloca agus msaa.

source: Use the priority sliders in building windows to adjust delivery of a specific ware. Holding down Shift while clicking will adjust all wares at once.
target: Cleachd sleamhnachain a’ phrìomhachais ann an uinneag togalaich gus gleus a chur air lìbhrigeadh bathair shònraichte. Cùm Shift sìos fhad ’s a bhios tu a’ briogadh gus a h-uile bathar a chur air gleus aig an aon àm.

source: If you like to live dangerously, pressing Ctrl while clicking the enhance, dismantle or destroy building buttons will skip the confirmation.
target: Ma tha thu coma mu chunnart, ma chumas tu Ctrl sìos ’s tu a’ briogadh air putan leasachaidh, millidh no toirt às a chèile an togalaich, gearraidh tu leum thairis air an dearbhadh.

source: Some buildings, such as the farm, have a very small work area. If the building is surrounded with trees or roads, production will stop.
target: Tha raon-obrach glè bheag aig cuid a thogalaichean, can an tuathanas. Ma thèid an togalach a chuairteachadh le craobhan no rathaidean, cha shaothraich e bathar tuilleadh.

source: When a building is destroyed, its workers will start looking for a nearby flag from which they can move by road to a connected warehouse. If there are no such flags in the vicinity, they will keep wandering around and eventually die.
target: Nuair a bhios togalach air a mhilleadh, bidh an luchd-obrach a’ sireadh bratach faisg orra aig a bheil rathad a bheir gu taigh-stòrais iad. Mur eil bratach dhen leithid am fagas, thèid iad air seachran gus am faigh iad bàs air deireadh na sgeòil.

source: Well done! We will soon start producing logs, which we will need for building more buildings.
target: Sin thu fhèin! Tòisichidh sinn air an fhiodh a sholar a dh’fheumas sinn airson barrachd thogalaichean a thogail a dh’aithghearr.

source: Well done! We will soon start producing granite, which we will need for building more buildings.
target: Sin thu fhèin! Tòisichidh sinn air a’ ghaireal a sholar a dh’fheumas sinn airson barrachd thogalaichean a thogail a dh’aithghearr.

source: The liana cutter working at this site can’t find any tree in her work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a jungle preserver’s hut.
target: Cha do lorg tè nan eidheann a tha ag obair an-seo craobh taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh no bothan glèidheadair-coille a thogail.

source: The woodcutter working at this woodcutter’s hut can’t find any trees in her work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a jungle preserver’s hut.
target: Cha do lorg am buaineadair-fhiodha a tha ag obair aig am bothan buaineadair-fhiodha seo craobh taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh no bothan glèidheadair-coille a thogail.

source: The fisher working out of this fisher’s house can’t find any fish in his work area. Remember that you can increase the number of existing fish by building a fish breeder’s house.
target: Cha do lorg an t-iasgair a tha ag obair aig an taigh-iasgair seo iasg sam bith taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach tuilleadh. Thoir an aire gur urrainn dhut cur ris na tha ann de dh’èisg ma thogas tu ionad-àraich èisg.

source: The woodcutter working at this woodcutter’s house can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a forester’s house.
target: Cha do lorg am buaineadair-fhiodha a tha ag obair aig an taigh buaineadair-fhiodha seo craobh taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh no taigh planntair-choille a thogail.

source: The lumberjack working at this lumberjack’s hut can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a ranger’s hut.
target: Cha do lorg an coilltear a tha ag obair aig a’ bhothan coillteir seo craobh taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh no bothan maoir-choille a thogail.

source: The lumberjack working at this lumberjack’s house can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a forester’s house.
target: Cha do lorg an coilltear a tha ag obair aig an taigh coillteir seo craobh taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh no taigh planntair-choille a thogail.

source: The fruit collector working at this fruit collector’s house can’t find any berry bushes in his work area. You should consider building another berry farm, or dismantling or destroying this building.
target: Cha do lorg an cruinniche a tha ag obair aig an taigh-chruinniche seo preas dearcan taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut croit-dhearc eile a thogail faisg air no an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh.

source: The woodcutter working at this woodcutter’s house can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a forester’s house.
target: Cha do lorg an coilltear a tha ag obair aig an taigh buaineadair-fhiodha seo craobh taobh a-staigh an raoin-obrach. Bu chòir dhut an togalach a thoirt às a chèile no a mhilleadh no taigh planntair-choille a thogail.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Tha togalach ’ga thoirt às a chèile an-seo. Tillidh seo cuid dhe na stòrasan a chaidh a chleachdadh gus an togalach seo a thogail gu stòras do threubh.

source: Atlanteans use logs also as the base for planks, which are used in nearly every building. Besides the sawmill, the charcoal kiln, the toolsmithy and the smokery also need logs for their work.
target: Nì na h-Atlantaich maidean de dh’fhiodh is thèid an cleachdadh airson cha mhòr gach togalach aca. A bharrachd air a’ mhuileann sàbhaidh, feumaidh an sloc guail-fhiodha, a’ cheàrdach acainnean is an taigh-toitidh fiodh airson an cuid obrach.

source: Picks are used by stonemasons and miners. They are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Cleachdaidh clachairean is mèinnearan piocaidean. Thèid an saothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach iad tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: Felling axes are used by lumberjacks and produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Thèid tuaghan leagail a chleachdadh le coilltearan ’s a shaothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach iad tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: Therefore the gardener and the ranger use them. Produced at the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Mar sin, cleachdaidh an gàirnealair is am maor-coille tè. Thèid a saothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach i tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: They are one of the basic tools produced in a metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Seo tè dhe na h-acainnean bunasach a nì thu sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach iad tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: Hunting spears are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Thèid sleaghan seilg a saothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach iad tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: Scythes are produced by the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Thèid fàil a shaothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach iad tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: Bread paddles are produced in the metal workshop like all other tools (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Thèid crainn-arain a shaothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt mar a thèid gach acainn eile (ach cha saothraich an togalach e tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: Kitchen tools are needed for preparing rations, snacks and meals. Be sure to have a metal workshop to produce this basic tool (but it ceases to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Tha feum air acainnean cidsin airson greimeagan, lòin is miasan a dhèanamh. Dèan cinnteach gu bheil ceàrdach meatailt agad gus an acainn bhunasach seo a shaothrachadh (ach cha dèan an togalach iad tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: They are used in the smelting works and produced by the metal workshop (but they cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Thèid a chleachdadh leis a’ cheàrdach leaghadair ’s a saothrachadh sa cheàrdach meatailt (ach cha saothraich an togalach e tuilleadh nuair a thèid a leasachadh gu ceàrdach thuaghan is ceàrdach-cogaidh).

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce grout in about %s on average.
target: Ma thèid a h-uile bathar air a bheil feum a lìbhrigeadh ri àm, saothraichidh an togalach seo aol-tàthaidh gach %s sa chuibheas.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce a pitta bread in %s on average.
target: Ma thèid a h-uile bathar air a bheil feum a lìbhrigeadh ri àm, saothraichidh an togalach seo aran tur gach %s sa chuibheas.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce beer in about %s on average.
target: Ma thèid a h-uile bathar air a bheil feum a lìbhrigeadh ri àm, saothraichidh an togalach seo leann gach %s sa chuibheas.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce each tool in about %s on average.
target: Ma thèid a h-uile bathar air a bheil feum a lìbhrigeadh ri àm, saothraichidh an togalach seo gach acainn an ceann mu %s sa chuibheas.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce each type of ax in about %s on average.
target: Ma thèid a h-uile bathar air a bheil feum a lìbhrigeadh ri àm, saothraichidh an togalach seo gach seòrsa dhe thuagh gach %s sa chuibheas.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce an ox in %s on average.
target: Ma thèid a h-uile bathar air a bheil feum a lìbhrigeadh ri àm, saothraichidh an togalach seo damh gach %s sa chuibheas.

source: Marble columns represent the high culture of the Empire, so they are needed for nearly every larger building. They are produced out of marble at a stonemason’s house.
target: Riochdaichidh colbhan marmoir àrd-chultar na h-Ìmpireachd, mar sin bidh feum orra airson a’ mhòrchuid de na togalaichean mòra. Thèid an saothrachadh à marmor ann an taigh clachair.

source: Toggle building visibility
